<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The utility class that helps computing the index of the object inside trie</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// from its hash. The generator can be configured with the number of bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// used for each level of trie structure with \\c NumRootsBits and \\c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// NumSubtrieBits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For example, try computing indexes for a 16-bit hash 4660 with 8-bit root</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and 4-bit sub-trie:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   IndexGenerator IndexGen&#123;8, 4, Hash&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   size&#95;t index1 = IndexGen.next(); // index 18 in root node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   size&#95;t index2 = IndexGen.next(); // index 3 in sub-trie level 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   size&#95;t index3 = IndexGen.next(); // index 4 in sub-tire level 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is used by different trie implementation to figure out where to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// insert/find the object in the data structure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator">TrieHashIndexGenerator</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// information of the hash in current level. For example, if the object is</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a33664850672b797f3da588b9c02d1a80">Bytes</a>.size() &#42; 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Drop all the bits before StartBit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a33664850672b797f3da588b9c02d1a80">Bytes</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a33664850672b797f3da588b9c02d1a80">Bytes</a>.drop&#95;front(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a> / 8u);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a> %= 8u;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the index using the bits in range &#91;StartBit, StartBit + NumBits),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// note the range can spread across few &#96;uint8&#95;t&#96; in the array.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint8&#95;t Byte : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a33664850672b797f3da588b9c02d1a80">Bytes</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ByteStart = 0, ByteEnd = 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ByteStart = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Byte &amp;= (1u &lt;&lt; (8 - <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a>)) - 1u;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/triehashindexgenerator/#a1ccc1711881e6ab8fd991061d0904dd8">StartBit</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrentNumBits = ByteEnd - ByteStart;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurrentNumBits &gt; NumBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Byte &gt;&gt;= CurrentNumBits - NumBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CurrentNumBits = NumBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Index &lt;&lt;= CurrentNumBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Index |= Byte &amp; ((1u &lt;&lt; CurrentNumBits) - 1u);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumBits &gt;= CurrentNumBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumBits -= CurrentNumBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NumBits)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;ADT&#95;TRIEHASHINDEXGENERATOR&#95;H</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
